SELECT so_header_id, order_number, hcom.company_name, hcus.customer_name, order_date, order_status, hsh.created_by, (SELECT -- 金额为空，则返回0 IFNULL(SUM(order_quantity * unit_selling_price),0) AS order_amonut FROM hodr_so_line hsl where hsl.so_header_id = hsh.so_header_id ) AS order_amount FROM hodr_so_header hsh LEFT JOIN hodr_company hcom ON hcom.company_id = hsh.company_id LEFT JOIN hodr_customer hcus ON hcus.customer_id = hsh.customer_id where 1 = #{organizationId} AND hsh.so_header_id = #{soHeaderId}
AND hsh.order_status != '失效'
mapper.update: UPDATE hodr_so_header SET order_status = #{orderStatus}, object_version_number = object_version_number + 1 WHERE so_header_id = #{soHeaderId}
UPDATE hodr_so_header SET order_status = '失效', object_version_number = object_version_number + 1 WHERE 1 = #{organizationId} AND so_header_id = #{soHeaderId}
mapper.select: SELECT auto_increment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE table_name='hodr_so_header'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hodr_so_header (order_number, company_id, order_date, customer_id, created_by) VALUES (#{orderNumber}, (SELECT company_id FROM hodr_company WHERE company_name = #{companyName}), #{orderDate}, (SELECT customer_id FROM hodr_customer WHERE customer_name = #{customerName}), #{createdBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE hodr_so_header SET object_version_number = object_version_number + 1, order_date = #{orderDate}, company_id = (SELECT company_id FROM hodr_company WHERE company_name = #{companyName}), customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM hodr_customer WHERE customer_name = #{customerName}), object_version_number = object_version_number + 1 WHERE so_header_id = #{soHeaderId}
